document.discussion_title: LeAnn Rimes Flaunts Her Hot Bikini Bod In Celebration Of Her Five Year Wedding Anniversary!
document.topic_text: Your move, Brandi Glanville ! Over the weekend, LeAnn Rimes hit the beach HARD in a variety of sexy and revealing bikinis. The blonde is currently on vacation celebrating her five year wedding anniversary with husband Eddie Cibrian . In the snaps, Rimes flaunts a very toned and fit bod, which is a big accomplishment for any 33-year-old! The blonde also shared some cute pics of her and Eddie celebrating their romance. Check out some of the photos (below)! Aww! Looks like a blast! The singer captioned one of the happy shots: "Happy Times! @jprensena thx for the pic #sun #vacation #hubby #allsmiles." So nice. To make the situation even sweeter, Brandi tweeted her congrats to LeAnn, commenting: "@leannrimes Happy anniversary Happy 2watch my boys 4 my baby daddy so that y'all can celebrate! Get a tan for me #feeling pasty(mean it)." In response the beauty happily tweeted back: "@BrandiGlanville Thank you! Happy that we always pick up where the other leaves off. Xoxo." Finally! We've waited so long for these two to be cool… how amazing! Enjoy the rest of your trip, guys!
